outline:
1. to chasten, discipline, instruct, admonish
    1. (Qal)
      1. to chasten, admonish
      2. to instruct
      3. to discipline
    2. (Niphal) to let oneself be chastened or corrected or admonished
    3. (Piel)
      1. to discipline, correct
      2. to chasten, chastise
    4. (Hiphil) to chasten
    5. (Nithpael) to teach
kjv_def: bind, chasten, chastise, correct, instruct, punish, reform, reprove, sore, teach.
strongs_def: to chastise, literally (with blows) or figuratively (with words); hence, to instruct
